name: peertube
description: PeerTube is a decentralized, federated video hosting platform based on ActivityPub. It supports streaming, playlists, federation, and custom instances, providing a self-hosted alternative to YouTube.

features.title: Federated Video Hosting
features.description: ActivityPub protocol enables federation with other PeerTube instances and Fediverse platforms for decentralized distribution

features.title: Video Streaming
features.description: Adaptive bitrate streaming with multiple quality options ensures smooth playback across different connection speeds

features.title: Playlists And Channels
features.description: Organize videos into playlists and channels for structured content presentation and easier discovery

features.title: Video Transcoding
features.description: Automatic conversion to multiple resolutions and formats ensures compatibility across devices and bandwidth conditions

features.title: Comments And Moderation
features.description: Built-in commenting system with moderation tools to manage community interactions and filter spam

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Set videos as public, unlisted, or private with password protection and access restrictions
